statements: DELETE FROM genetic_variation WHERE population_id = 10 AND variant_type = 'SNP';
DELETE FROM genetic_variation WHERE individual_id = 123 AND population_id = 456;
DELETE FROM genetic_variation WHERE variant_type = 'SNP' AND allele_1 = 'A' AND allele_2 = 'T';
DELETE FROM variants WHERE chromosome = 1 AND position < 1000
DELETE FROM genetic_data WHERE genetic_id = 100 AND mutation_rate > 0.5;
DELETE FROM individuals WHERE age < 5 OR sex = 'F';
DELETE FROM Migration WHERE source_population_id = 3 AND migration_rate > 0.5;
